45.eng-name: Chapters on The Virtues of the Qur'an
45.ara-name: كتاب ثواب القرآن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Whoever recites Idha Zulzilat, it equals half of the Qur'an for him. Whoever recites: Qul Ya Ayyuhal-Kafirun it equals a fourth of the Qur'an for him. And whoever recites: Qul Huwa Allahu Ahad it equals a third of the Qur'an for him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِذَا زُلْزِلَتْ
chapter.eng-name: 'What Has Been Related About Idha Zulzilat'
